title: Fanatics, Investor Group Including Jay-Z, Buy Mitchell & Ness for $250 Million
sub_head: Fanatics will own three-quarters of the Philadelphia-based sports apparel company
body:
Sports-merchandise retailer Fanatics Inc. and a group of investors, including music artists Jay-Z, Meek Mill and Lil Baby, have acquired sports apparel company Mitchell & Ness, Fanatics said.
The deal is valued at $250 million, according to a person familiar with the matter. Fanatics will own 75% of the Philadelphia-based company. The investor group, which also includes LeBron James’s business partner Maverick Carter and the family of TikTok stars Dixie and Charli D’Amelio, will own the rest.
